data.message: God Bless America and the hard-working men who wear Carhartt for real...not just as a fashion statement. #MAGA My family supports President Trump!!

replies.message: Shut up! You make no sense! Lol hardworking because you wear Carhartt??? 😂 Obviously, Carhartt brand doesn't GAF of how hard you work! It's made for a fashion statement, I'm pretty sure that's why it's a go-to brand dumb ass! 😒
then get the fuck outta here bitch because we don't 😂👏

I've owned a carhartt for YEARS!!! I'm not a hardworking man (I'm a hardworking woman) that's besides the point. My point is it keeps me warm idc what name is on it if it's made well and keeps me warm ill wear it! And ill definitely rock an 8 mile one!!

Keisha Hightower Carhartt is not a brand made for fashion. While Carhartt may be a popular brand for fashion in recent years, the company was built on the basis of the blue collar, hard working American man. Specifically railroaders, steel workers, and other hard laborers. It is a go to brand for many reasons, the main one(even after over 120 years) being the quality, and the durability for those who work in tough conditions.

As I stated before, obviously Carhartt doesn't care of how hard you "men" work or your blue collars because they obviously made it a source of fashion! You think the owner or whoever said to Eminem, "No, I'm not going to sign you to our brand because we're not made for fashion...just hard working men deserve to wear our brand" No, that's what you and Becky up there ^ wants to believe! Because you think you are above everyone else! So please, spare me, Susan!

When you pick out a coat, overalls, or a jacket...I bet your simple ass, it would be "Carhartt" because of the name! Just like when I buy, Nikes, UGGs, or Prada! You're no better than anyone else! Your high horse is just a jackass on stilts!
Don't know you could buy prada with EBT?

Keisha Hightower  You read entirely out of context. The point of my comment, was to inform. I stated that yes, it has become a brand for fashion in recent years, but the original purpose of the company was for working class Americans. I do not believe myself to be above anyone, that is what you seem to think, and how you have interpreted the comment. There is no one person who “deserves” to wear Carhartt. That is an ignorant statement, and was never even insinuated. Anyone is welcome, and even encouraged, to wear and proudly represent Carhartt. My great uncle was the Vice President of Carhartt  and has since retired. This company is very special to myself and my family, and the entire community of which a large factory is in place and operation currently. Ultimately, the company was created for reasons other than fashion alone, and has a very rich history, meaning more than what looks “cool” nowadays. I think if you are wanting to be rude to a woman who simply stated her opinion, you should be informed on the history of the subject on which you are arguing the purpose of. Anyways, have a good evening. Here’s a link Incase you’d like more info. (-:

https://www.carhartt.com/content/content-125-history?cid=PRODUCT-DIFFERENCE-CONTENT-CarharttHistory-20131007-ALLVisitors-clp_m_carhartthistory_0914

Oooooh good one! Because I'm black and a financial advisor at a bank, and the owner of my house at age 24, and helps more people twice my age and the opposite of my color get back on track with their financial circumstances and improving their credit scores 5 days out of a week then I must be on EBT 😂😂😂😂 I get it...moving on! I didn't come here to argue!
And it should be *I didn't @Mike I also minor in English Literature, but thank you!
Thanks Hannah! I do apologize, but your comment sounded kind of snobbish to me (in my head) I apologize, nonetheless 😊
Don’t buy it then. It really is that simple.

Sorry Keisha Hightower...you just sound dumb and clueless...as a construction worker,i laughed my AAAASSSSS off reading this..carharrt IS for hardworking people..DEFINITELY NOT a fashion statement lmao 😂

So, the point of a Carhartt line for 8 mile fans is definitely NOT a fashion statement??? Like, only the cool farmers wear it! It's all the rage! (Or should I say  range) 😂Now who's the real dumb one here really??? Not I says the cat!

I'm finish! Super duper tired and sleepy from being at work all day! One just may call me hard working, I should order one of these, huh? Goodnight!

Carhartt like any company is in for the money dam my 7 year old grandson wears one pretty sure he is not a hard worker point is anybody can wear this jacker I never noticed a dam sign that said you had to be a hard worker I will buy this jacket because Eminem 8 mile is on it and it will keep me warm carhartt knows Eminem will make them alot of money like any company.
Keisha Hightower "I'm finish." ? That English major at work.
Just bullshitting you i don't really care. These people are just petty.
What do political beliefs have to do with a clothing like , like who cares?...
If you didn't say anything about Trump all these idiots wouldn't be mad. It's sad how petty humans can be.
Fuck Trump.

This limited edition 8 mile Carhartt IS for fashion. Who's going to wear this to work? The money is going to the Marshall Mathers Foundation. So it's going to a good cause.  And this isn't the first time Carhartt has teamed up with Eminem for limited edition items.
